com.ephesoft.dcma.workflows.common

Class WorkflowVariables

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.ephesoft.dcma.workflows.common.WorkflowVariables

  • public class WorkflowVariables
extends java.lang.Object
    This class represents the cluster of methods and variables for workflow process instance accessories.
    Version:
    $LastChangedDate:$
    $LastChangedRevision:$
    Author:
    Ephesoft created on Oct 21, 2014

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      static java.lang.String BATCH_INSTANCE_ID
      String Variable for Batch instance ID object for the workflow process instance.
      static java.lang.String IS_MODULE_REMOTE
      String Variable for denoting if the module execution is remote or not for the workflow process instance.
      static java.lang.String KEY
      String Variable for key(batch instance identifier used) object for the workflow process instance.
      static java.lang.String RESTART_WORKFLOW
      String Variable for module name, from which restart of workflow is required, object for the workflow process instance.
